section_context_for_this_product_block: A.
FIRE PUMP ROOM
FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1450 RPM
feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, application: hydrant system

section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D3 | WATER CURTAIN
full_product_description:
Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  conforming to IS-1239 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope.
50 NB

section_context_for_this_product_block: PLC AUTOMATION
full_product_description: SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF PLC BASED DV CONTROL PANEL FOR FOAM SPRINKLER SYSTEM AND FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM INTERGRATION PANEL WITH PLC. Supply,Installation,Termination of cable,Testing and Commissioning of PLC Based Deluge Valve Control Panel with accessories. The panel should have local push botton switched for emergency operation from panel.Panel and associated accessories shall be designed to withstand environmental conditions at site.Panel in open areas shall be weatherproof to IP-65 as per IS/ IEC-60529. Canopy/Shed of adequate sizes shall be provided for each panel to protect from weather, the cost of the same shall be included in the panel cost.No extra payment shall be made for providing fixture , fittings & accessories. PLC Based DELUGE VALVE CONTROL PANEL should contain the following:- 1. Programmable Logic Controller. 2.Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator  with sounder. 3.UPS. 4.Cables (Power & Control) Specification of Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) : 1.Input Power: 24vdc,Redundant Supply. 2.Application capabilities with up to 7 expansion I/O modules for a maximum of 256 discrete I/O. 3.Up to 6 embedded 100 kHz highspeed counters (on controllers with dc inputs) 4.2 Serial ports with DF1/ DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support. 5.Ethernet port provides you with  EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP and Modbus TCP/IP protocol support as well as web server and email capabilities. 6.Built-in LCD with backlight allows you to view controller and I/O status, and provides a simple interface for messages, bit / integer monitoring and manipulation. 9.Memory:non-volatile battery backed RAM. 10.online editing:yes. 11.Operating Temp.:-20°C...+60°C. 12.Storage Temp:-40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C. Specification of Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator with sounder:  Window display shall be back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type integral power supply. Specification of UPS: 1.Alarm Condition: 1 hours. 2.Standalone Condition: 4 Hours. For 22 nos. Deluge Valve IO point 3 nos (22 W + 3 S)-SOLVENT PLANT
core_product_name: plc based deluge valve control panel
size: deluge valve io point: 22 nos, panel: 3 nos (22 W + 3 S)
feature_or_specifications: system: foam sprinkler system and fire water pumping system integration, operation: local push button switches for emergency, weatherproof: IP-65 as per IS/ IEC-60529, canopy: included, accessories: included, controller: programmable logic controller, alarm annunciator: solid state or microprocessor based programmable type with sounder, ups: included, cables: power & control, plc input power: 24vdc, redundant supply, expansion: up to 7 expansion I/O modules, max discrete I/O: 256, highspeed counters: up to 6 embedded 100 kHz, serial ports: 2 with DF1/ DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support, ethernet: EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP, Modbus TCP/IP, web server, email, lcd: built-in with backlight, memory: non-volatile battery backed RAM, online editing: yes, operating temperature: -20°C...+60°C, storage temperature: -40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C, annunciator window display: back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type integral power supply, ups alarm condition: 1 hour, ups standalone condition: 4 hours
